title: Contact
text:
Feel free to reach out to me via the following channels:

Work Email: yhongda@umich.edu

I’m open to collaborations, job opportunities, or just chatting about data science and statistics!

title: About Myself
text:
Hi welcome to my website! I’m Hongda Yuan, or Tony if you like. I finished my undergrad at the University of Nottingham, with a Bachelor’s degree in Honors Statistics. And I’m currently a master student in Applied Statistics at the University of Michigan.
You can find my CV here. Download My CV

title: About Myself
text:

title: About Myself
text:
Academic Interests
I’m attracted to computational statistics and data science in general, to be more specific, my academic interest include:

Statistical Learning (Gaussian Process, Kernel Methods)
Biostatistics (Experiment Design, Power Analysis)
Bayesian Modelling

title: About Myself
text:
Other Interests
I’m also interested in Phonetics, Linguistics and football/soccer(?). I can speak:

English
Spanish
German
Madarin
Cantonese
